pkgmetadata.longdescription: Optimal transport in various forms // Solve optimal transport problems in statistics. Compute Wasserstein metrics (a.k.a. Kantorovitch, Fortet--Mourier, Mallows, Earth Mover's, or minimal L_p metrics), return the corresponding transference plans, and display them graphically. Objects that can be compared include grey-scale images, point patterns, and mass vectors.
